data.title: Things to see and do
data.text:
Hotham Park Bognor Regis

Hotham Park is the largest park in Bognor Regis and was originally the home of Sir Richard Hotham and set within 20 acres. Find out more about Hotham Park.

West Park

Located near Aldiwck beach, West park is a large park popular with dog walkers and has a great dog friendly cafe. There is also a children's pay area, public conveniences and and a small pay and dsiplay car park.

South Downs Planetarium

Located in Chichester not far from Bognor Regis is the Southdowns Planitarium where you can experience the magic of the night sky in a comfortable 96 seat auditorium.
